name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Timer Win: Productivity Timer & Site Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set focus timers and block distracting websites. Stay productive and achieve more with ease. Developed by Agisul Wintalearn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Elevate Your Efficiency with Our Pomodoro Timer Extension! 🌟

Struggling to maintain focus during online work or study sessions? Our extension is designed to transform your productivity with powerful, easy-to-use features.

Key Features:

⏲️ Customizable Focus Timer: Divide your work into focused intervals, perfectly tailored to fit your personal schedule. Adjust the duration to maximize your concentration and make every minute count.

🚫 Website Blocking: Eliminate online distractions by blocking websites that tend to divert your attention. Stay on task and keep your focus where it belongs.

📈 Instant Updates: Enjoy seamless updates with real-time timer adjustments and immediate status changes right in the popup. Stay informed and on track without any delays.

🛠️ Simple Blocklist Management: Effortlessly manage your blocklist with an intuitive interface. Easily add or remove websites to maintain control over your distractions.

Transform your productivity with this straightforward yet powerful tool. Achieve more in less time by staying focused and eliminating interruptions.

For support or inquiries, contact us at: admin@wintalearn.com
Explore more on our website: https://wintalearn.com

⬇️ Download now and start your journey towards unparalleled productivity! ⬇️

Developed by Agisul WintaLearn.
